messages.content: Minecraft is a sandbox video game originally created by Swedish programmer Markus Persson and later developed and published by Mojang. The game allows players to build with a variety of different blocks in a 3D procedurally generated world, requiring creativity from players. Other activities in the game include exploration, resource gathering, crafting, and combat.
